name: Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock (In Effect)
description: During this round, after the next time your character deals Geo DMG: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides Shield, grant one such Status with 3 Shield points.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>During this round, after the next time your character deals $[K106]</color>: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides $[K6], grant one such Status with 3 $[K6] points.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>During this round, after the next time your character deals {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color></color>: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>, grant one such Status with 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points.
